item.author: xuanphuc.a1gv@gmail.com (Felix Hoang)
item.description: If you thought the biggest gaming news was the upcoming Switch 2, think again. The emulation community has made a breakthrough: you can now run Nintendo Switch games on your iPhone or iPad at buttery-smooth 60FPS—all offline, with no jailbreak, no shady VPNs, and zero sketchiness.

item.title: Lesson Learned in Three-day Trip to Sapa Hope Center
item.author: xuanphuc.a1gv@gmail.com (Felix Hoang)
item.description: This is my diary about the trip to Sapa Hope Center with 10 colleagues from Summit Education - a renowned English language teaching center in Hanoi. Therefore, this trip is aimed at fostering cultural exchange and teaching English and basic skills to students from Grade 1 to Grade 2 in Sapa, Lao Cai.
